traitDefinitions.name: Little stinger
traitDefinitions.desc: This below average sized stinger is bad for defense.

RNG.name: Range
RNG.desc: Number of cells a bee can fly before having to return to the hive.

STR_P.name: Pollen Storage
STR_P.desc: The amount of pollen a bee can hold.

STR_N.name: Nectar Storage
STR_N.desc: The amount of nectar a bee can hold.

STR_W.name: Water Storage
STR_W.desc: The amount of water a bee can hold.

SPD_F.name: Flight Speed
SPD_F.desc: The rate at which a bee can traverse 1 cell.

SPD_C.name: Collection Speed
SPD_C.desc: The rate at which a bee can collect 1 resource from a node.

PRD_H.name: %(resource)s Production Rate
PRD_H.desc: The rate at which a bee can produce %(resource)s.

YLD_H.name: %(resource) Production Yield
YLD_H.desc: The amount of %(resource)s a bee can produce.

COST_H_N.name: %(resource)s Production Cost (%(cost)s)
COST_H_N.desc: The amount of %(cost)s a bee needs to produce %(resource)s.
